description:
A time tracker and timesheet app that lets you track work hours across projects.


- UI Improvement: The main time-tracker window has been redesigned to be more intuitive and user-friendly.
- UX Improvement: Description is preserved when switching between Timer, Manual and Break modes.
- Fix: Auto tracker items cannot be deleted while recording is active.
- Fix: Clicking the Clockify system tray icon always brings the app to the front.
